param.name: term
param.label: Search Term
param.description: The term to search for on Twitter

param.name: rpp
param.label: Results
param.description: How many results to return per page load.

param.name: type
param.label: Search Result Type
param.description: Specifies what type of search results you would prefer to receive. The current default is mixed.

param.name: bannedwords
param.label: Banned Words
param.description: A comma seperated list of banned words to search for in Tweets. When matched, the Tweet will not be displayed.

param.name: bannedusers
param.label: Banned Users
param.description: A comma seperated list of banned Twitter users to not display Tweets from.
